review: I was very happy when I met Dr Mithilesh, he is a fantastic person who told me about all the issues related with the complication, he suggested few lab test which I think was required by that time- CBC, urine routine, stool routine. Now I am regular visitor to him for my kid.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I visited him for couple of times for my SON's infection issues like loose motions, vomiting, fever e.t.c. I noticed that he will be there on time always. 
And he listens to us very well *** ***** ****** *********** ** **** *** **** ******* ****. And he explains the issue very openly and clearly.
He answers all kind of questions what you ask(that means if you don't ask he may not explain anything too) 
And he suggests us not to give any outside food or packed food like Nestom/Cereloc e.t.c. He encourages to give always home made food and sometimes he explained us how/what to cook for kids.
I liked him a lot.
Not at all friendly. Don't visit to this doctor. He doesn't explain the problem.  He will just listen and write the prescription.

This was the very pathetic experience , I ever had in my life with a doctor. *** ********* ******* ***** *** ** ***** ******* I went to Apollo clinic, sarjapura road for 2months baby girl . she was suffering from cough and cold. This doctor didn't listen to us properly and explain anything. We were keep on asking him, he is saying a word as answer. The bad thing is, while we were worried about our baby, he was talking over phone continuously. His behavior is very bad and attitude is not at all positive. I suggest everyone please don't go to meet this doctor and don't spend your valuable money and time.

When he speaks on phone with some friends or family members, they are more important for him than the patient and needs of the patient. I asked for a certificate and he asked me to wait and then he told me to come after 2 days. Since he was busy on Phone!!!
Very Bad attitude for a Doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Today I have visited this doctor for my son who is suffering with cold from last two weeks. I never seen this kind of doctor in my life who is not even responding first 5 mins of time since he was busy on phone. he didn't even open his mouth after details explained about my son illness. He just written relent  and azythromycin syrups which I was for my son from last one week. I have told the same to the doctor but he again said use this medicine and come back after 3 days. this is the word which he opened in the end.Paying 700 as consultation fee *** ********* **** * ***** ******* Apolo clinic should think on it.

Visited first time to Apollo clinic,sarjapur road,For my 7 months old son.front office staff were very cooperative but the doctor is not approachable and not at all responsive,he speaks a word for our many questions and very rude,not at all bothered about our concerns,Will not at all recommend this doctor.pls don't go and feel bad afterwards.overall very bad experience.
Was very patient in listening to he problem and also in explaining the solution.  Highly experienced as well.

Excellent doctor, he listen to our concerns patiently. Approachable person, proscribe relevant medicines only. All suggest natural remideies or solutions than giving any supplements. We are very regular for this doctor. **** *** *** *****

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We regularly visit him for kids vaccination and we are very comfortable with Dr. Mithilesh, very friendly and prescribes medicines only if needed for kids.  Thanks sir.
